channel.title: RSPS Quest Tab Help
channel.description:
Hey guys I've been coding this server for quite a while and i'm curious as how to add the words in the quest tab to click on and the prompt comes up. I already have the quests coded and npcs set i just need to place the "button" in the quest tab? What folder do i go into inorder to add the clickable button. I thought it was ClickingButtons.java but idk. Here is a picture. Of what im talking about [IMG]http://i1180.photobucket.com/albums/x402/modzillascape/Capture-3.jpg[/img]
basically where the blue is, is where i want words that i can click and the quest prompt comes up. My action button is 66112. The ring of incar.. is 66111. If that helps. Thanks!! for helpin!!
[b][size=36pt]NEVER MIND I FOUND IT IN THE CLIENT FOLDER IN RS INTERFACE! :p SORRY[/size][/b]
